title: One Perfect Night
description: Townsville, Australia, 1943. Tanner is a captain in the US Army, stationed at a radio post on an island in the middle of nowhere.Nick is a coastwatcher, a man whose voice Tanner has only heard before over the radio waves.They meet in the middle of war, when nothing is certain but this: Tanner and Nick are owed one perfect night.
author: Lisa Henry
